  16. ‌let main () =
  17.   let args =
  18.     Ccomp.quote_files ~response_files:true (List.tl (Array.to_list Sys.argv))
  19.   in
  20.   let ocamlmktop = Sys.executable_name in
  21.   (* On Windows Sys.command calls system() which in turn calls 'cmd.exe /c'.
  22.      cmd.exe has special quoting rules (see 'cmd.exe /?' for details).
  23.      Short version: if the string passed to cmd.exe starts with '"',
  24.      the first and last '"' are removed *)
  25.   let ocamlc = "ocamlc" ^ Config.ext_exe in
  26.   let extra_quote = if Sys.win32 then "\"" else "" in
  27. ‌  let ocamlc = Filename.(quote (concat (dirname ocamlmktop) ocamlc)) in
  28. ‌  let cmdline =
  29.     extra_quote ^ ocamlc ^
  30.     " -I +compiler-libs " ^
  31.     "-linkall ocamlcommon.cma ocamlbytecomp.cma ocamltoplevel.cma " ^
  32.     args ^ " topstart.cmo" ^
  33.     extra_quote
  34.   in
  35.   exit(Sys.command cmdline)

  37. let _ = main ()
